TextView.android:text: SHES Audit of subcontractors
FRP PROJECT SHE&S PLAN REF # 21-00-SA-PC-NA-0001
Company SHES policy printed and displayed?
Company having an approved site specific safety plan for the project?
Is Subcontractor Project SHES organization chart is prepared/updated and responsibilities of key personnel are clearly mentioned?
Is Subcontractor complied the ratio of SHES staff against the workforce at site?
Is all project approved procedures are available with subcontractor and followed?
All incident /Accident investigations are carried out in accordance to the approved project procedure & records are available?
SHES Communications
SHES KPI’s board displayed and updated regularly?
Is regular TBT/TSTI’s are being conducted with work crew’s to enhance their awareness about the risk involved on the activities and control measures?
SHES notice boards are placed at site and SHES information’s, alerts, incident lesson learned and other relevant information’s are placed/updated?
Adequate safety signages are installed at project site and maintained?
SHES Meetings, walkthrough’s are being conducted and the discussions are minuted for actions?
Documented evidence for overcome language barrier, how the procedure implemented and how it is measured.
SHES Inspection
Is SHES Inspection are being carried out as per schedule
Is there an Inspection Calendar prepared for every month and compliance followed?
Is Inspection Tracking Register Maintained for follow up?
Is Competent personal identified for Inspection?
Is inspection sticker / colour code system followed?
Is there any item overdue for inspection?
Third party Inspection carried out from an authorized vendor for equipments, machineries, lifting gears etc… and validity tracked?
HAZARD OBSERVATION & MITIGATION
Is an Observation reporting system is in place?
Is Workers are motivated / promoted to raise observation cards?
Is the Observation trends are identified / cascaded & control measures in place to prevent the reoccurrences / reverse the trend?
Whether the observation KPI’s as per the plan is compiled?
TRAINING AND COMPETENCY
Is approved Training matrix available with subcontractor and compliance followed?
Dedicated Trainer mobilized and got approved for Contractor?
Training Passport is available with all personal and completed trainings are updated?
Is there Training Catch up schedules are prepared and followed for compliance?
Training Schedules are communicated to all through mails, display in notice boards etc…
Whether a comprehensive database prepared for Training and updated with personal information?
Whether On Job Training is organized for the skill based activities at site & recorded?
Whether appropriate Third Party Trainings arranged for the skill based personal as per approved project procedures (e.g: fire watch, AGT, Scaffolder, Rigger, Operator etc…) ?
PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENTS
Is the PPE’s provided to the workforce are as per approved project procedure and relevant International standard?
Is the colour code system being followed for helmet & coveralls as per approved Project PPE Procedure # ?
PPE storage maintained 15% stock availability in case of immediate use?
Is there any provision for storing the PPE’s while it’s not in use?
Is a Register maintained to track the issuance of PPE’s?
Is workforce are issued / replaced with PPE’s whenever necessary?
INCENTIVE & PROMOTION
Is subcontractor conducting incentive programs to promote workers motivation as per section 10.2 of sub-contractor site specific safety plan # HE3-SC-DRA-4-102?
Are proper criteria being followed for selection of personal for incentives?
PTW, JSA & RISK ASSESSMENT
Is all work activities in the projects are covered under PTW?
Only Trained PTW holders are taking Permit to work at site?
Is subcontractor maintained a PTW Register?
Whether all activities in the permit is covered in approved MS & JSA
Is all activities are being carried out at project site with relevant and approved JSA
Is competent personal participated in the JSA Review meeting and signed in the JSA
Is the site copy of JSA is signed by PTW performing authority as an acknowledgement
Is RA is prepared for critical activities and being implemented?
HEALTH & HYGIENE
All project employees are undergone FTW and passed?
Audiometry for all Riggers, Drivers and Operators at helium-3 Project.
High noise activity identified and proper barricade and signage provided?
Is adequate First aiders are available at site as per approved ratio 25:1 and their name/contact number displayed at strategic locations?
First aid boxes are available at site and regular inspection being carried out?
Emergency eyewash station available and water filled / changed frequently (every 3 days)
Toilet provision at site is per the manpower ratio?
Water handlers are having valid MOPH certificate?
Potable water analysis available posted at the water stations and updated?v
Water chiller filters changed as per the approved procedure?
Water chiller cleaned and maintained?
Rest shelter provision is as per ratio of manpower at site?
MSDS and COSHH are update and available in the work area? Is it discussed to the workforce?
Heat stress management arrangement and control measures complied and followed?
Adequate cool water at site provided?
Proper Work-rest rotation being followed?
ENVIRONMENT MANAGEMENT
What are the processes and actions that the Contractor intends to use to comply with applicable environmental laws?
How is the effectiveness of mitigation measures assessed?
Describe the waste reduction / minimization / recycling strategies
Subcontractor shall ensure daily inspections of all waste management facilities
Subcontractors to provide an inventory of all chemicals, hydrocarbons and hazardous material to be used during construction, with storage locations, etc… provide sketch of work and storage areas.
Spill response and cleanup equipments in place?
SECURITY MANAGEMENT
Subcontractor having the copy of approved security management procedure?
Is adequate numbers of security guards are available as per the plan?
Is competent personal are mobilized as security guards and they are well aware about their duties and responsibilities?
Is any security Breaches reported? & the control measures are in place to avoid reoccurrences.
Is alcohol Test being carried out for Safety critical & Non critical category of workforce?
TRANSPORT & ROAD SAFETY
Approved procedure in place to manage the Transport and road safety arrangements?
Is subcontractor maintained adequate/appropriate transport arrangement for staff and workers?
Is there a Transport coordinator appointed to manage transport arrangements
Is IVMS installed in all project vehicles and the records being monitored?
Is bus Marshals are assigned at Buses?
Are Drivers forum & regular Driver /Operator TBT being carried out by subcontractor?
